name: Circular Vampire Hunter
description:
So this game is about you being a Vampire, that can't stay on the outside, but you want to be safe and kill all the circles that follow you.

Use arrow keys to move, up to jump

Use Z to Attack your enemies

To recover life you need to be near a hole and press X to dissappear and take cover

This will slowly increase your life and freeze enemy movement, to return to the map, press X again

Try to get the highest score!
